lead_paragraph: American swimmer Michael Phelps, the most decorated Olympian of all time, said on Tuesday he hopes this year's Rio Olympics can help heal a sports world hit by recent doping and corruption cases.

headline.main: Phelps Hopes Rio Games Can Lift Troubled Sports World
headline.print_headline: Phelps Hopes Rio Games Can Lift Troubled Sports World
